title: Border, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: withdrawn element work with needle-made fillings and embroidery plus macramé
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Wide border of openwork edged at one side with a macramé border with deep triangular pendants.
